committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water, Power and Offshore Energy Resources

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to execute and implement a contract for the design, construction, operation, and maintenance of facilities in the South Delta, California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to implement a contract for the design, construction, operation, and maintenance of facilities in the South Delta, California. Sets forth conditions for cost sharing by the United States, the California Department of Water Resources, and the South Delta Water Agency.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to execute and implement a contract for the design, construction, operation, and maintenance of facilities in the South Delta, California, and for other purposes.
